queries.login: SELECT * FROM dim_accounts WHERE username = ? AND password = ?
queries.sign_up: INSERT INTO dim_accounts (username, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
queries.checkCase: SELECT case_id FROM case_applications WHERE case_id LIKE ? ORDER BY case_id DESC LIMIT 1
queries.createCase: INSERT INTO case_applications (case_id, patient_id, patient_source, requesting_physician, request_date, exam_type, service_type, notes, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
queries.retrievePhysicians: SELECT physician_id FROM dim_physicians WHERE physician_name = ?
queries.insertQueue: INSERT INTO queue_table (case_id, requesting_physician,request_date, service_type,status) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?);
queries.queuedCases: SELECT * FROM queue_table WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY case_id ASC
queries.CheckPatientId: SELECT patient_id FROM dim_patients WHERE patient_id LIKE 'PID%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 1
queries.RegisterPatient: INSERT INTO dim_patients (patient_id, firstname, middlename, lastname, birthdate, gender, email_address, mobile_number, address) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)
queries.GetRegisteredPatients: SELECT * FROM dim_patients ORDER BY patient_id ASC
queries.GetServiceRecordByCaseId:
SELECT c.case_id, c.patient_id, c.patient_source, p.physician_name AS requesting_physician, c.request_date, c.exam_type, c.service_type, c.notes, c.status
FROM case_applications c
LEFT JOIN dim_physicians p ON c.requesting_physician = p.physician_id
WHERE c.case_id = ?;
queries.RetrievePatientCases:
SELECT c.case_id, c.patient_id, c.patient_source, p.physician_name AS requesting_physician, c.request_date, c.exam_type, c.service_type, c.notes, c.status
FROM case_applications c
LEFT JOIN dim_physicians p ON c.requesting_physician = p.physician_id
WHERE c.patient_id = ?;
queries.TotalPatientsRegistered: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM dim_patients
queries.TotalCasesDone: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) AS total_cases_done FROM case_applications WHERE status = 'Done'
queries.UploadFindings: INSERT INTO case_results (case_id, radiographic_findings, radiographic_impressions, radiologist, radio_technologist, status) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
queries.UpdateCaseStatus:
UPDATE case_applications
SET status = ?
WHERE case_id = ?
queries.CheckCaseStatus: SELECT status FROM case_applications WHERE case_id = ? LIMIT 1;
queries.PDFReportData: SELECT ca.case_id, CONCAT(dp.lastname, ', ', dp.firstname, ' ', dp.middlename) AS patient_name, ca.patient_source, dr.physician_name, ca.request_date, ca.exam_type, ca.service_type, cr.radiographic_findings, cr.radiographic_impressions, drl.radiologist_name, drl.medical_credentials AS radiologist_medical_credentials, drt.radio_tech_name, drt.medical_credentials AS tech_medical_credentials, cr.status FROM case_applications ca INNER JOIN dim_patients dp ON ca.patient_id = dp.patient_id INNER JOIN dim_physicians dr ON ca.requesting_physician = dr.physician_id INNER JOIN case_results cr ON ca.case_id = cr.case_id INNER JOIN dim_radiologist drl ON cr.radiologist = drl.radiologist_id INNER JOIN dim_radio_technologist drt ON cr.radio_technologist = drt.radio_tech_id WHERE ca.case_id = ? AND cr.status = 'Done'
queries.FilterPatientbySearch: SELECT * FROM dim_patients WHERE CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) LIKE ? OR firstname LIKE ? OR lastname LIKE ? OR patient_id LIKE ?
queries.FilterCaseStatus: SELECT ca.case_id, ca.request_date, ca.service_type, ca.status, dp.physician_name FROM case_applications ca LEFT JOIN dim_physicians dp ON ca.requesting_physician = dp.physician_id WHERE status = ? ORDER BY case_id ASC
queries.RetrieveRadiologistbyName: SELECT radiologist_id FROM dim_radiologist WHERE radiologist_name = ?
queries.RetrieveRadioTechbyName: SELECT radio_tech_id FROM dim_radio_technologist WHERE radio_tech_name = ?
queries.VerifyPatientRegistration: SELECT * FROM dim_patients WHERE firstname= ? AND middlename = ? AND lastname = ?
queries.UpdatePatientInfo: UPDATE dim_patients SET firstname = ?, middlename = ?, lastname = ?, birthdate = ?, gender = ?, email_address = ?, mobile_number = ?, address = ? WHERE patient_id = ?;
queries.Analytics_total_XrUltr: SELECT MONTHNAME(request_date) AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN case_id LIKE '%X%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_xray, SUM(CASE WHEN case_id LIKE '%U%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_ultrasound FROM case_applications WHERE status = 'Done' GROUP BY MONTH(request_date), MONTHNAME(request_date) ORDER BY MONTH(request_date);
queries.Analytics_rfrrls_perM: SELECT dp.physician_name AS physician_name, DATE_FORMAT(ca.request_date, '%Y-%m') AS referral_month, COUNT(ca.patient_source) AS total_referrals FROM case_applications ca INNER JOIN dim_physicians dp ON ca.requesting_physician = dp.physician_id WHERE ca.patient_source = 'Referral' GROUP BY dp.physician_name, referral_month ORDER BY referral_month;
queries.Analytics_radService_perM: SELECT name, role, request_date, SUM(total_services) AS total_services FROM (SELECT dr.radiologist_name AS name, 'Radiologist' AS role, DATE_FORMAT(ca.request_date,'%Y-%m') AS request_date, COUNT(cr.case_id) AS total_services FROM case_results cr INNER JOIN dim_radiologist dr ON cr.radiologist = dr.radiologist_id INNER JOIN case_applications ca ON cr.case_id = ca.case_id GROUP BY dr.radiologist_name, DATE_FORMAT(ca.request_date,'%Y-%m') UNION ALL SELECT rt.radio_tech_name AS name, 'Technologist' AS role, DATE_FORMAT(ca.request_date,'%Y-%m') AS request_date, COUNT(cr.case_id) AS total_services FROM case_results cr INNER JOIN dim_radio_technologist rt ON cr.radio_technologist = rt.radio_tech_id INNER JOIN case_applications ca ON cr.case_id = ca.case_id GROUP BY rt.radio_tech_name, DATE_FORMAT(ca.request_date,'%Y-%m')) AS combined GROUP BY name, role, request_date ORDER BY request_date;
